# Figures {#sec-figures}

```{r} 
#| label: 'set-rda-dir-figs'
#| echo: false 
#| warnings: false 
#| eval: true
figures_dir <- fs::path('C:/Users/samantha.schiano/Documents/GitHub/a11y-sandbox/asar-tagged-alttext', 'report', 'figures')
``` 

```{r} 
#| label: 'fig-pop.naa-setup'
#| echo: false 
#| warnings: false 
#| eval: true
# load rda
load(file.path(figures_dir, 'pop.naa_figure.rda'))

# save rda with plot-specific name
pop.naa_plot_rda <- rda

# remove generic rda object
rm(rda)

# save figure, caption, and alt text as separate objects
pop.naa_plot <- pop.naa_plot_rda$figure
pop.naa_cap <- pop.naa_plot_rda$cap
pop.naa_alt_text <- pop.naa_plot_rda$alt_text
``` 

```{r} 
#| label: 'fig-pop.naa'
#| echo: false 
#| warning: false 
#| fig-cap: !expr pop.naa_cap 
#| fig-alt: !expr pop.naa_alt_text
pop.naa_plot
```
